Author: inklesspen
Content: It's rather disingenuous to say "you all suffer from confirmation bias because you ignore my posts" and then claim ad hominem attacks when people point out that your posts are not that interesting. _You_ are the one who started the conversation focusing on you and your posts.

Author: bootload
Content: hey matt, thanks for finding this series it's a blast reading.

Author: Goladus
Content:
Or it's something new. It is a news site, after all.

I'm a commenter too. I figure once I learn enough and have something significant to contribute, I'll start a blog.

Author: bootload
Content:
'... At least I have the courage to try ...'

it's not the courage bit that I'm skeptical about. Its the scope. It's fine to have a BHAG but try a smaller problem and solve it. This particular problem is someones academic career. Is it a a product someone would buy?

Title: lift/scala for web apps -- all of twitter's traffic on 2 machines?
